task_data.title: Troubleshoot Monitoring Site Access
task_data.description: Fix monitoring site accessibility - user reports inability to access monitoring sites
requirements: Check if ingress resources exist for monitoring namespace
Verify LoadBalancer IPs are accessible from user's network
Check if services need NodePort or Ingress instead of LoadBalancer
Create ingress resources if needed (grafana.ry-ops.dev, prometheus.ry-ops.dev)
Document access URLs and troubleshooting steps

context.issue: User cannot access monitoring sites currently

deliverables: Working ingress configuration or access documentation
Verified access to Grafana and Prometheus
Troubleshooting guide for future access issues
test_criteria: Can access Grafana dashboard from browser
Can access Prometheus UI from browser
Ingress or LoadBalancer configuration is stable

context.routing_reason: Pattern-based routing via MoE - development pattern match (troubleshoot, fix, configure)
context.expected_outcome: Monitoring sites accessible with documented URLs
